text: Amusaa Katunda Mwanamwambwa (born 15 May 1940) is a Zambian former politician. He was a member of the National Assembly for Liuwa between 1991 and 1998. In 1998 he became Speaker of the National Assembly. He left office in 2011.Speaker of the National Assembly, Amusaa Mwanamwambwa has retired Lusaka Times, 25 June 2011 Mwanamwambwa was a member of the Movement for Multi-Party Democracy. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the National Assembly (Zambia)
title: Amusaa Mwanamwambwa
